attributes.review: First off it was so glitchy it kicked me out for an warning of what I’m about to see on this app gladly my phone will never let me see this stuff but I don’t care 🙃🤡 sadly people who like this app are like you but don’t worry we as an big group going to do the best get rid of it 😁😁😁
attributes.title: The fat Cheeto man

attributes.review:
i opened the app to see inappropriate photos of young children, as well as this orange man touching on them. i was appalled by what i was seeing and believe that this app should be PERMANENTLY deleted. i also found that the app is constantly glitching and contains a lot of bugs. this app should be taken down IMMEDIATELY.
xoxo😘🥰
attributes.title: help me-barron trump

attributes.review: I can’t even explain the trauma this app has given me. If I could give it less one star I would, but unfortunately it won’t let me. I opened the app and was immediately assaulted with images of a cheeto. Please just save yourself and don’t download this I beg of you.
attributes.title: please save yourself

attributes.review: as soon as you open the app you’re immediately attacked with bigotry and racism, honestly coming from the president of the United States I would expect more. But I guess that’s what happens when you put a racist, white supremacist, child rapist, sexist, white man who looks more accurately as a orange into office. disgusting.
attributes.title: absolutely trash

attributes.review: Bro this app made me blind like blind at first. And I was like aight chill, I mean I don’t gotta look at him . BUT THE SECOND A I HEArd SOUND FROM THAT FAT CHEETO, I lost my hearing, that is my story and that is how the name Helen Keller is so engraved in history. I am hellen Keller and I am not afraid and I want u all to share my story of how I lost my hearing and sight by this trump administration app 👩🏻‍🦯👩🏻‍🦯👩🏻‍🦯👩🏻‍🦯👩🏻‍🦯👩🏻‍🦯👩🏻‍🦯👩🏻‍🦯

attributes.review: the amount of fake news on this app is terrifying. like really trump who’s going to believe an article titled “the reason i’m so hot” like god self centered much. obviously BIASED. so if you would like to keep your mind holy do not i repeat DO NOT get this app. i don’t think i’ll ever be the same after this...

attributes.review: This app was just not it. Did not fufill my expectations. Wasn't expecting much and it still disappointed. It is really embarrassing to all app users. attributes.title: Make another app great

It was funny because he was waving like he was important but there was five or six people supporting him.I then realized that I was looking at the president. After realizing the president was such a loser I’ve decided to switch to the Democratic Party.
attributes.title: I am now a democrat
